title: Is the Redmi Note 9 Pro Max the best affordable camera phone in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: No , the Poco X2 has much better cameras under 20000 in India , but the camera quality is good for the price if you are talking about Redmi note 9 Pro max.
The camera hardware is there only for the hype. Photos are decent in well lit areas. But in darker areas the camera is not able to keep up.
